name: One Endless Night at MLG's 4 Remake
name_original: One Endless Night at MLG's 4 Remake
description:
Welcome back to square one. In the fourth game of the MLG's Remake series, you finally are back in the newer version of the Strip Club. You must protect yourself from the memes, with whatever you got, otherwise, they'll n0sc0pe you.

Coded entirely by ToonsterGames

Voice Acting by Devin Manning
